did.unittitle: Thielman mss.
did.abstract: The Thielman mss., 1978-1995, consist of the catalogue of the fine bindings collection of James L. Thielman acquired by the Lilly Library in 1998.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.
Many collections are housed offsite; retrieval requires advance notice. Please make an appointment a minimum of one week in advance of your visit.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: James L. Thielman was a collector of fine bindings. He was esteemed among bibliophiles, and 80 bindings from his personal collection were acquired by the Lilly Library after his death in 1996.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The catalogue was prepared by Martha R. Thielman and consists of a short typed entry for the binder, author, title, printer and date of binding, as well as a color photograph of the binding. Each item is numbered and the entire file is arranged in chronological order by date of binding from 1978-1995. Also present, following the catalogue, is an "Index of Binders"; "Cost (Book & Binding)," arranged in numerical order of the catalogue; "Estimated Value – July 1994," also in numerical order; and finally a list of all the books, each entry of which includes in addition to author, title, etc., the date of publication and the cost of the volume, arranged in alphabetical order by name of binder.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: A list of the bindings is available. The books are cataloged in the Lilly Library. Consult IUCAT at call number: Z274 .A2 T43.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Photography and digitization may be restricted for some collections. Copyright restrictions may apply. Before publishing, researchers are responsible for securing permission from all applicable rights holders, then filling out the Permission to Publish form.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Thielman mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: See the Thielman mss. II, also at the Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.
